summary: Adds 14 new Horker Items to the game (weapons,shield,misc), craftable at forge (misc)
descriptionHtml:
[center]I've quit modding and moved on to social work and game programming.
As a final gift: [b] ALL MY ASSETS ARE FREE TO USE[/b]
For further details and constraints, please check out the board thread:
[url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift/]http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1779275-time-to-say-good-bye-and-a-little-gift[/url]
Cheerio and keep on playing![/center]

[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/cjvg6yn1e5l8cof2d.png[/img]


[youtube]8vGSabF3cH0[/youtube]



[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjvjepvwo94w8dgsl.jpg[/img]

[/center]

Adds new Horker weapons and a shield to the game, craftable at forge (misc), leveled list.

[b]Main Mod:[/b]
Regular Edition = without Crossbow, no requirements
Dawnguard Edition = crossbow included, DG DLC required

[b]Details:[/b]

[b]Main Mod:[/b]
Adds 2 variations to the forge (both category: misc), variation I dmg based on IRON weapons and II based on DAEDRIC. Bandits/Forsworn use variation I.

[b]Optional ESP File:[/b]
Contains several optional .esp files, one variation craftable at forge (category: misc). Damage values based on STEEL, DWARVEN, ORCISH, ELVEN, GLASS, EBONY or DAEDRIC weapons, pick the .esp you prefer. Bandits/Forsworn use an own version (Battererd Horker Weapons based on IRON dmg values)

Installation:
Install Main Mod first, download optional file, open archive, open folder of the desired dmg category and unpack Ghosu-Horker Weapon Pack.esp to ...|Skyrim|data|... to replace the original .esp. YOU HAVE TO UNPACK/REPLACE THE .ESP FILE ONLY, NOT THE WHOLE FOLDER.

Atm there are only optional .esp files for Dawnguard Edition, Regular Edition might follow...



[b]Notes:[/b]

All weapons are made of vanilla weapon parts, clutter items and textures, so it works with default low resolution vanilla textures as well.
BUT i would [b]HIGHLY (!!!) recommend[/b] to use HD textures (mod or official 2k pack) to improve texture quality.

I'm using:
Weapon Textures: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24909[/url]
Horker Tusk Texture: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47956]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/47956[/url]

This is a little fun project, like my Helmet Mod - not focused on high quality textures since all items are made of original items to make them feel vanilla. Check out my Ghosu - Weapon Pack for "better" stuff made from scratch.



[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/cjvgen3m0lutzqjwl.png[/img][/center]

Unpack the archive content to ...Skyrim|data|

Folder structure should be:
...Skyrim|data|meshes|weapons|Ghosu - Horker| NIF FILES
...Skyrim|data|textures|weapons|Ghosu - Horker| DDS FILES
...Skyrim|data| Ghosu - Horker Weapon Pack.ESP

To uninstall simply remove these files.


[center][img]http://666kb.com/i/cjvgflj9u12tfh6it.png[/img][/center]

[b]Q: SKYRE?[/b]
A: See comment section sticky.

[b]Why does the Crossbow Edition require DG?[/b]
A: Because crossbow mechanics require DG...

Have fun and happy holidays!
Ghosu



[b]New weapons, matching Auriel's Bow:[/b]

[img]http://f.666kb.com/i/cmzzubgdenxs6s33q.png[/img]
LINK: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52445]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52445[/url]

Looking for new weapons?
Check out my Weapon Pack featuring 18 weapons in 32 variations and a shield.

[img]http://666kb.com/i/c9xcxywq4r7bwn4gi.png[/img]

LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28545//?[/url]

[b]Looking for new helmets, a Bone Shield or new staffs?[/b]
Check out my Helmet Mod featuring over a dozen new helmets and more:

[img]http://666kb.com/i/cjcfllho4k90tm6vk.png[/img]
LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43293]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/43293[/url]

... and my other mod featuring muskets, blunderbuss and even a grenade launcher:
[img]http://666kb.com/i/c8u1v8s2in5lxaypd.png[/img]
LINK: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653/?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26653/?[/url]
